name: NoWhereIs
description:
The game represents a dream to panopticon, held us from the very beginning of our life: childhood, family institute, nursery school, high school, university, works, office and so on. If time stops, you are in the LOOP.

In this short game try to use your skill in another way, for example, to start time again how can I use a chair? What kind of interaction can u use? There are two final cuts in the game, depending of your LOOP indicator (start or stop).

And yes... Do not forget to take a flashlight.

WASD - moving/+ Shift - accelerate

Tab - Interact with the furniture

Left Mouse Click - grab an item

F - start dialog.

This is my first own game. Enjoy!
